Life is full of surprises, Adventure is a part and parcel of engineering life. In this limited 4years an engineering student would have experienced lot of unforgettable moments. To quench one's thirst for Adventure "Chakravyuha"the trekking club of UVCE was started by students.

Club usually holds 2 trekking drives in each semester. Starting point of every trek being UVCE, it tries to explore trekking spots across Bengaluru within a tight budget and give students an adventure experience.

The recent treks being:

1. Kunthi betta
2. Makalidurga
3. Tadiyandanmol
4. Chanarayanna durga
